title: No. 2 Virginia Tech comes up short in 4-1 loss to No. 15 Clemson - VT hokiesports.com
content: No. 2 Virginia Tech comes up short in 4-1 loss to No. 15 Clemson  VT hokiesports.com
description: PITTSBURGH, Pa. --Â The No. 1 Virginia Tech Hokies fell 4-1 to the No. 15 Clemson Tigers in the semifinals of the ACC Championship on Friday afternoon.
